LanguageData.OEC_Helmet.label: OEC Hunter Helmet
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed for use by Hunters representing the OEC.
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M.label: OEC Inquisitor Helmet
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nThe hardened version provides more protection to the owner.
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M_Spacer.label: OEC Inquisitor Helmet(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M_Spacer.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M_Melee.label: OEC Inquisitor Helmet(Gladiator)
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M_Melee.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified visor with analyzing computer that helps the user close combat.
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M_Ranged.label: OEC Inquisitor Helmet(Ranger)
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M_Ranged.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified visor with targeting computer that helps the user aim.
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M_Mechanitor.label: OEC Inquisitor Helmet(Overseer)
LanguageData.OEC_Helmet_M_Mechanitor.description: Light power armor Helmet, well protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified for improves Mechanoids Control abilities.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor.label: OEC Hunter Armor
LanguageData.OEC_Armor.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed for use by Hunters representing the OEC.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nThe hardened version provides more protection to the owner.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Spacer.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Spacer.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Smoker.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Fogler)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Smoker.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified with the addition of a Smokepop pack.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Jump.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Raven)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Jump.verbs.Verb_Jump.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Raven)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Jump.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified with the addition of a Jump pack.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Grenadier.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Huntsman)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Grenadier.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified by installing the Stun Cannon.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Shield.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Guardian)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Shield.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified with the addition of a Reinforced Barrier.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Barrier.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Protector)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Barrier.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified with the addition of the Universal Barrier.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Mechanitor.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Overseer)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Mechanitor.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified with the addition of a Mechanoids Control pack.
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Turret.label: OEC Inquisitor Armor(Goblin)
LanguageData.OEC_Armor_M_Turret.description: Light power armor, well protects the owner without mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by Inquisitors representing the OEC.\n\nModified with the pack that allows the user to deploy a battery-powered turret.
LanguageData.Bullet_OEC_Stun.label: Stun bullet
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OEC_TurretPack.label: OEC turret pack capsule
